segments.text: Excuse me , but could you tell me the way to the railway station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The railway station ? Just go down this street and turn left at the second corner . The station is at the end of that street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take me to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's very clear . I think I can find my way now . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
